properties.name: Artis Point
properties.description: Posted by DrakeMost photogenic location in the park. Great views of the canyon and lower falls. (photo grab from "The Wonders of Yellowstone" video @Yellowstone Media.

properties.name: Badger Cubs - Little America
properties.description: Posted by DrakeBadger can be found around the Northeast area of the park.(photo still courtesy "The Wildlife of Yellowstone" dvd @Yellowstone Media).

properties.name: Bald Eagle - Madison River
properties.description: Posted by DrakeBald Eagle make the Madison River their home throughout the season.(photo still courtesy "The Wildlife of Yellowstone" dvd @Yellowstone Media.

properties.name: Barronette Peak - Mountain Goats
properties.description: Posted by DrakeMountain Goats can be viewed from Pebble Creek campground. (photo still courtesy of "The Wildlife of Yellowstone" dvd @ Yellowstone Media).

properties.name: Bighorn Sheep - Yellowstone River
properties.description: Posted by DrakeBighorn Sheep can be found along the Yellowstone and Gardiner Rivers as seen in "The Wildlife of Yellowstone" dvd @Yellowstone Media.

properties.name: Bridge Bay Campground
properties.description: Posted by DrakeThe largest campground in Yellowstone National Park. All services available as shown in "The Wonders of Yellowstone" dvd @Yellowstone Media.

properties.name: Canyon Campground
properties.description: Posted by DrakeLocation

properties.name: Canyon Village
properties.description: Posted by DrakeCanyon Village is another great location for a central base

properties.name: Fall Rut Elk
properties.description: Posted by DrakeThe Madison Valley in the park, is one of the best area\'s in the world to observe elk during the fall rut. (photo still courtesy of "The Wildlife of Yellowstone" dvd @Yellowstone Media).

properties.name: Hayden Valley
properties.description: Posted by DrakeHayden Valley is one of the best locations to view Grizzlies and Wolves. Frame grab from The Wildlife of Yellowstone dvd copyright Yellowstone Media

properties.name: Lake Hotel
properties.description: Posted by DrakeÂ Lake Hotel is located on breathtaking Yellowstone Lake. (photo still from "The Wonders of Yellowstone" dvd. @Yellowstone Media.

properties.name: Lamar Valley
properties.description: Posted by DrakeThe Lamar Valley is the best location to spot wolves as featured in "The Wildlife of Yellowstone" dvd

properties.name: Lookout Point
properties.description: Posted by DrakeAlong with one of the best views of Lower Falls, Lookout Point is a great locaton to spot many Osprey. @YellowstoneMedia.com

properties.name: MT. Haynes
properties.description: Posted by DrakeMT. Haynes one of the most scenic mountains in the park. (photo still courtesy of Yellowstone Media.

properties.name: Mammoth
properties.description: Posted by DrakeYellowstone National Park headquarters. The parks\' busiest town. Lodging, restaurants, gas, food and elk. (photo courtesy of "The Wonders of Yellowstone" @Yellowstone Media.

properties.name: Midway Geyser Basin
properties.description: Posted by DrakeMidway Geyser Basin along the Firehole River. (photo still courtesy "The Wonders of Yellowstone" dvd @Yellowstone Media.

properties.name: Mountain Goat
properties.description: Posted by DrakeBest location to spot Mountain Goat

properties.name: Norris Geyser Basin
properties.description: Posted by Drake

properties.name: Old Faithful - Upper Geyser Basin
properties.description: Posted by Drake

properties.name: Otter - Madison River
properties.description: Posted by DrakeThe Madison River is prime habitat for trout, eagles and otter (photo still courtesy "The Wildlife of Yellowstone" dvd @Yellowstone Media).

properties.name: Peregrine Falcon with chicks
properties.description: Posted by DrakeThis Peregrine Falcon is located 400 yards across the canyon. This film grab is from "The Wildlife of Yellowstone" dvd and a 5200mm lens was used to film it.

properties.name: Roosevelt Lodge
properties.description: Posted by DrakeRustic cabins and restaurant in the heart of Yellowstone

properties.name: Tower Area
properties.description: Posted by DrakeThe Tower area has an excellent campground location as shown in "The Wonders of Yellowstone" dvd. This area also has the highest concentration of black bears

properties.name: Tower Falls
properties.description: Posted by DrakeShort hike to one of the best waterfall in the park

properties.name: West Thumb Geyser Basin
properties.description: Posted by DrakeOne of the most unique geyser basins as featured in "The Wonders of Yellowstone" dvd (photo still.

properties.name: space needle
properties.description: Posted by DrakeLocation
